## 查DNS  

**cat /etc/resolv.conf**

```
zbb@python:~/Cpro$ cat /etc/resolv.conf  
# Dynamic resolv.conf(5) file for glibc resolver(3) generated by resolvconf(8)  
#     DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE BY HAND -- YOUR CHANGES WILL BE OVERWRITTEN  
nameserver 127.0.1.1  
search localdomain  
```
## 查进程的线程  

**查进程中有多少线程（1或者2）：**  

    - 1.  ps  -T -p  pid  

    - 2.  top -H -p  pid  
	
```
zbb@python:~/Cpro$ ps -T -p 2277
   PID   SPID TTY          TIME CMD
  2277   2277 ?        00:00:00 update-notifier
  2277   2281 ?        00:00:00 gmain
  2277   2282 ?        00:00:00 gdbus
  2277   2283 ?        00:00:00 dconf worker
  
zbb@python:~/Cpro$ top -H -p 2277

  top - 17:19:09 up  3:21,  1 user,  load average: 0.09, 0.09, 0.02
Threads:   4 total,   0 running,   4 sleeping,   0 stopped,   0 zombie
%Cpu(s):  0.9 us,  4.2 sy,  0.0 ni, 94.9 id,  0.0 wa,  0.0 hi,  0.0 si,  0.0 st
KiB Mem :  4028116 total,  2693776 free,   665864 used,   668476 buff/cache
KiB Swap:  4192252 total,  4192252 free,        0 used.  3070204 avail Mem 

   PID USER      PR  NI    VIRT    RES    SHR S %CPU %MEM     TIME+ COMMAND     
  2277 zbb       20   0  556416  32916  27692 S  0.0  0.8   0:00.33 update-not+ 
  2281 zbb       20   0  556416  32916  27692 S  0.0  0.8   0:00.16 gmain       
  2282 zbb       20   0  556416  32916  27692 S  0.0  0.8   0:00.00 gdbus       
  2283 zbb       20   0  556416  32916  27692 S  0.0  0.8   0:00.00 dconf work+ 
```
